header: GlowBoost 10% Vitamin C Serum: Your Daily Dose of Radiance
description: Unleash your skin's natural luminosity with **GlowBoost 10% Vitamin C Serum**, expertly crafted for **oily and combination skin types**. This potent serum is your ultimate solution for achieving a visibly brighter, more even complexion and effectively targeting stubborn **dark spots**. Featuring a powerful **10% pure Vitamin C concentration**, a renowned antioxidant, it actively works to **brighten dull skin**, reduce hyperpigmentation, and reveal a youthful glow. Enhanced with skin-plumping **Hyaluronic Acid**, our non-greasy formula delivers essential hydration, making it the ideal **Vitamin C serum for oily skin** that craves radiance without excess shine. Incorporate 2-3 drops into your morning routine before sunscreen to protect and transform your skin. Experience the confidence of a smoother, more luminous appearance. (Note: Mild tingling may occur for sensitive skin, which is normal and temporary.)
key_benefits: Effectively fades dark spots and hyperpigmentation
Promotes a more even and radiant skin tone
Formulated specifically for oily and combination skin

specifications.How to Use: Apply 2-3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
